amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used to issue a national security letter to a health insurance company under any of the provisions of law amended by section 505 of the USA PATRIOT ACT.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 344).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Nadler.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 344).
